# Signatories

The following members of the community have endorsed our proposal:

Max Kuhn, Posit, lead developer of tidymodels: "This critical topic is complicated and has no public and easy-to-use public educational tools. Having these particular experts develop training materials using open and cost free software would enable many practitioners to 'level up' their expertise."
